validation_criteria: Only measurements with Location + Time + Brix value

measurements.location: Rio Queen Citrus, Rio Grande Valley
measurements.source: PMC Study - Influence of storage temperature on Rio Red grapefruit
measurements.notes: Initial harvest measurement, week 0 of storage study. Storage up to 12 weeks maintained Brix 11.20-11.97 range.

summary.data_quality: Complete - has location, specific harvest date, Brix value
summary.note: Most grapefruit data behind paywalls or incomplete. Direct university contact needed for Rio Star, Flame, Ray Ruby trials.
